HistoricalInsightDialog.title: Historical Insights for {name}
HistoricalInsightDialog.description: Discover AI-powered context about your ancestor's life and times.
HistoricalInsightDialog.initialPrompt: Click the button below to generate insights about {name}'s name, birthplace, and the historical events of their era.

1.name: Semyon Slizh
1.bio: A veteran of World War II, John was a carpenter by trade and a loving grandfather.

2.name: Maria Ivanovna Slizh
2.bio: Mary was a school teacher known for her kindness and delicious apple pies.

3.name: Yuriy Semyonovich Slizh
3.bio: An architect who loved to sail. He designed several notable buildings in his city.

4.name: Valentina Slizh
4.bio: A journalist who traveled the world, Jane had a passion for storytelling and photography.

5.name: Sarah Smith
5.bio: A software developer and amateur musician, Sarah carries on her family's legacy of creativity.
